description: I wanted to make a porridge with teff alone, but I just didn’t like the flavor enough So I added some of those tiny high-protein, high-calcium, gluten-free seeds to oatmeal, along with chopped dried apricots, golden raisins and cinnamon Chopped toasted hazelnuts are my first choice for topping.
title: Oatmeal and Teff With Cinnamon and Dried Fruit
title_page: Oatmeal and Teff With Cinnamon and Dried Fruit Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I wanted to make a porridge with teff alone, but I just didn’t like the flavor enough. So I added some of those tiny high-protein, high-calcium, gluten-free seeds to oatmeal, along with chopped dried apricots, golden raisins and cinnamon. Chopped toasted hazelnuts are my first choice for topping.
Featured in: Ancient Grains For Breakfast.
